1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Attr.Message
6  ( -- * Abortable
7    abAttr,
8    abAttrTrees,
9    abSlot,
10    abSlotTree,
11    abortableTree,
12    abortableTrees,
13    -- * Message
14    dupAttr,
15    extraAttr,
16    noSlotName,
17    noSlotIndex,
18    reqAttr,
19    reqAttrName,
20    unexpAttr,
21    unexpAttrMulti,
22  ) where
23
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Para             as S
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol           as S
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree            as S
28
29-- | Abortable scope for attribute.
30abAttr        :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
31abAttr        = B.abortable "attr"
32
33-- | Abortable scope for attribute.
34abAttrTrees   :: [S.TTree] -> B.MapAb b
35abAttrTrees   = abortableTrees "attr"
36
37-- | Abortable scope for slot.
38abSlot        :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
39abSlot        = B.abortable "slot"
40
41-- | Abortable scope for slot.
42abSlotTree    :: S.TTree -> B.MapAb b
43abSlotTree    = abortableTree "slot"
44
45-- | Same as 'abortable' except for using 'S.TTree'
46--   instead of list of 'S.Token'.
47abortableTree :: String -> S.TTree -> B.MapAb b
48abortableTree tag = B.abortable tag . B.untree
49
50-- | Same as 'abortable' except for using list of 'S.TTree'
51--   instead of list of 'S.Token'.
52abortableTrees :: String -> [S.TTree] -> B.MapAb b
53abortableTrees tag = B.abortable tag . B.untrees
54
55-- | Unexpected attribute / Duplicate
56dupAttr :: [S.TermName] -> B.Ab a
57dupAttr ns = unexpAttr $ "Duplicate " ++ unwords (map S.termNameString ns)
58
59-- | Extra attribute
60extraAttr :: B.Ab a
61extraAttr = Left $ B.abortBecause "Extra attribute"
62
63-- | No slot content
64noSlotName :: Int -> String -> B.Ab a
65noSlotName n name = Left $ B.abortLine "No slot content" $ detail n where
66    detail 0 = "Positional attribute @'" ++ name
67    detail 1 = "Named attribute -"       ++ name
68    detail 2 = "Global slot @@"          ++ name
69    detail a = "Unknown slot level "     ++ show a
70
71-- | No slot content
72noSlotIndex :: [String] -> Int -> B.Ab a
73noSlotIndex xs n = Left $ B.abortLines "No slot content" $
74                   ("No index @'" ++ show n ++ " in") : xs
75
76-- | Require attribute
77reqAttr :: String -> B.Ab a
78reqAttr = Left . B.abortLine "Require attribute"
79
80-- | Require attribute
81reqAttrName :: String -> B.Ab a
82reqAttrName = Left . B.abortLine "Require attribute name, e.g., -xxx"
83
84-- | Unexpected attribute
85unexpAttr :: String -> B.Ab a
86unexpAttr = Left . B.abortLine "Unexpected attribute"
87
88-- | Unmatch any patterns
89unexpAttrMulti :: [S.ParaUnmatch String] -> B.Ab a
90unexpAttrMulti [u] = Left $ B.abortLines "Unexpected attribute" [attrDetail u]
91unexpAttrMulti us  = Left $ B.abortLines "Unmatch any patterns" $ map attrDetail us
92
93attrDetail :: S.ParaUnmatch String -> String
94attrDetail u =
95    case u of
96      S.ParaOutOfRange _ p  -> require $ S.paraMinLength p
97      S.ParaUnknown  ns     -> "Unknown "  ++ unwords ns
98      S.ParaMissing  ns     -> "Missing "  ++ unwords ns
99      S.ParaMultiple ns     -> "Repeated " ++ unwords ns
100    where
101      require 0 = "Attributes not required"
102      require 1 = "Require one attribute"
103      require 2 = "Require two attributes"
104      require 3 = "Require three attributes"
105      require n = "Require " ++ show n ++ " attributes"
106
